name: The Guild of Jasperaian
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL DEVELOPING! IF YOU COME ACROSS BUGS OR MISSPELLINGS, PLEASE REPORT THEM TO ME!

CURRENTLY, THERE ARE NO PLANS TO RELEASE THE GAME FOR ANDROID. MAIN REASON IS NOT ENOUGH KNOWLEDGE TO FIX THE CONTROLS TO SUIT ANDROID'S NEEDS. HOWEVER, IF THE CHANCE ARISE AND I MANAGE TO FIND THE SOLUTION FOR THIS TYPE OF GAME, I WILL BE SURE TO POST IT ON HERE.

Summary:

In the Kingdom of Jasperaian, on the day of the Colosseum Event, 8 individual characters, each with different backgrounds and skills are brought together through a series of events that formed the Guild. Throughout their quests, they find that there are darker secrets than they have ever expected. Lords and Ladies of the Organization known as the Zodiac Circle has corrupted their powers. Such as Elves being turned into Werewolves or man made disasters ready to cut the population in half, there are no shortage!


Despite the weight on their shoulders, the Guild are seen through their own determination to stop the current evil from taking over their city. However, the Guild themselves have their own secrets. Play and watch the Guild start from scratch! Choose how their stories will end! Be the heroes that they deserve to be!

Travel throughout the City or World Map and uncover secrets that were forgotten! Recruits more members into your Guild as your reputation rises or through Quests and conditions!

Game has it's own Map System. Can travel throughout the City by Taxis. 

This game has flashing lights so if you are sensitive to such things, please consult with your doctor before playing or better yet, don't play it at all. I don't want you getting hurt. So stay safe.

This game has strong profanities (Languages not suitable for children), Gore, and violence. It is directed more for Mature audiences (Age +17 and up) to play this game. There are no Sexual Content.
